achievements.name: Opening Night
achievements.desc: Complete Act 3 in the Imaginarium Theater on any difficulty.

achievements.name: Opening Night
achievements.desc: Complete Act 6 in the Imaginarium Theater on any difficulty.

achievements.name: Opening Night
achievements.desc: Complete Act 8 in the Imaginarium Theater on any difficulty.

achievements.name: Revue Synchronicity
achievements.desc: Complete an entire performance in the Imaginarium Theater after having invited a Supporting Cast character.

achievements.name: Fate's Unpredictable Favor
achievements.desc: Complete an entire performance in the Imaginarium Theater on any difficulty having selected at least 8 Mystery Cache events.

achievements.name: Reliable Narrator
achievements.desc: Complete an entire performance in the Imaginarium Theater on any difficulty having selected at least 8 Wondrous Boon or Brilliant Blessings events.

achievements.name: More Than Pearls and Gold
achievements.desc: Obtain a total of 3 Toy Medals.

achievements.name: More Than Pearls and Gold
achievements.desc: Obtain a total of 6 Toy Medals.

achievements.name: More Than Pearls and Gold
achievements.desc: Obtain a total of 9 Toy Medals.

achievements.name: The Uses of Enchantment
achievements.desc: Learn 3 total Thespian Tricks from Wolfy's Thespian Trove.
